record.name: PC Key Card
record.description: An ActivCard smart card or an ActivKey USB device together with a certificate enables you to identify yourself within the network whenever strong authentication is required. ActivKey is the default device; ActivCards are only issued in exception cases.
record.detailedDescription: An ActivCard smart card or an ActivKey USB device together with a certificate enables you to identify yourself within the network whenever strong authentication is required. ActivKey is the default device; ActivCards are only issued in exception cases.
